reviews.text: I recently stayed at this hotel and enjoyed it. The front desk staff was pushy, but helpful. The rooms are beautifully decorated and have a mini-fridge. The bathroom was modern and spacious. Breakfast wasn't the best, but not the worst either.
reviews.title: Nice and quiet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is in a quiet neighborhood, but not far from a main street with shops and grocery stores, and also within walking distance of the train station. Would gladly stay here again.
reviews.title: A Good Stay and Not as Bad as Some Reviews make out!

likes.disliked: — One of the male front staff

reviews.title: Basic comfort not quality.
reviews.text: We've just come back from spending a week at the Hotel Donatello and had a good time. I was a bit concerned after reading some of the earlier reviews but I have to say that our room was perfect for the two of us, overlooking the Square which we found to be quite safe with no sign of anyone selling anything.

We were originally put into a huge quad room (106 I think) but asked for a transfer to another smaller double room as it was just the two of us. This was no problem and we were put into room 222. Great for us the only thing missing was a bath but we had a good shower and everything was clean and tidy with good maid service each day. We had no problem with noise, however I would certainly request another front facing room should we return.
reviews.title: Service cannot get any worse! Stay away!
Good Choice
reviews.text: We felt the breakfast was adequate by European standards. Yes the dining room is small but it didn't matter to us, the food was topped up regularly even when we arrived at the last minute at 9.30. There were assorted rolls and pastries, ham and cheese, cereal, yoghurt and various jams, butter and fruit. The machine which dispensed various coffees was fine and everything offered completely suited our needs.

reviews.title: Nice Place to Stay
reviews.text: We were very pleased with Comfort hotel Donatello. The staff were very friendly, the rooms were very clean, and the hotel is in a great location. It's within walking distance to all of the main attractions. The breakfast is pretty basic, but if you don't like it, there are many cafes close by. I would definetly stay here again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel was next to Piazza Indipendenza and only walking distance from Florence (Firenze) Santa Novella train Sta.There are lots of shops, cafe and restaurant nearbly. It was pretty close to Accademia. Florence was easy to access on foot. The room was decorated in style (I beleive it was Florence style- green color for bed cover and curtain). Front desk staff could speak English well. I will definitely stay in this hotel for my next trip to Florence.
reviews.title: Good Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the hotel donatello for 2 nights Friday 23rd Feb, Saturday 24th Feb.
reviews.title: SLightly disappointed

likes.liked: — The large ceilings and architecture of the building
likes.disliked: — no light in the room, breakfast and noise in the hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is about 10 minute walk straight down Plaza Indepenzia, which was convenient, but not too convenient for our return flight when we had to leave at 3am and pass a couple of prostitues on the way down. During the day time it is not like this though.
reviews.title: Hotel was nice but....
Beautiful city, nice hotel
reviews.text: It is also about a 10minute walk to the amenities of the city - which is okay, but your feet do get tired after walking around the city all day.

reviews.title: Nice hotel.......but!!!!!!!
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at the Donattelo for four nights. Ideally situated for walking around the major sites of Florence. The hotel itself was clean and the rooms big enough with a fantastic interior( headboard, furnishings and ceiling) Breakfast limited but adequate.

But........heating very very strange. You have to call reception to both switch it on and off. We stayed late January and although lovely during the day it was fairly cold at night and the noisy blow heating just could not cope. It also came on at random times during the night which would wake you up. Rooms not very well soundproofed, could hear plumbing and various other noises coming from adjacent rooms.
reviews.title: Great location and clean rooms.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would dearly love to recommend the hotel but when you cannot get a decent nights sleep for four nights then I am afraid I could not do it.
reviews.title: Good Hotel, Enjoyed our Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: p.s. Florence itself is well worth a visit !!
reviews.title: Ideal Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location was perfect. Close to the main sights, but still back in a quiet peaceful square. The room was clean and very large, a great plus especially in Italy. The breakfast was a little poor, with only a few different things to choose from. The Duomo was five minutes away. The pizzeria across the street was awesome. Very cheap pizza (five euros) and the best pizza we had the entire trip. Overall a great place to stay while in Florence. Would highly recommend.
reviews.title: Ok... but some concern

reviews.text: The hotel is ok, the service was fine but the walls are very very thin. The room looked fine, nice and clean, beautiful bathroom, location is fine (within 10 min walking of the city centre). But so noisy. Conclusion, a good 3 star hotel but don't forget the earplugs.
reviews.title: OK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: By the way: Florence is beautifull for a short citytrip.
reviews.title: Give this a miss

reviews.text: Hotel was very grubby.
reviews.title: Took 13 rooms at Donatello and very happy.
internet service "terrible", treatment, the same
reviews.text: Breakfast was served in a cramped conditions with poor quality food & beveridges.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Air condition was controlled by staff and only switched on after complaining after day two.
reviews.title: Good Location
